articles.content: Von Spakovsky said, “If you talk to election officials in Florida, they’ll tell you that Brenda Snipes is known as the most incompetent election official in the state, and she just blithely acts as if she doesn’t know any of that. The past mistakes and things… [+2066 chars]

articles.author: John Binder
articles.title: Watch–Caravan Migrants Arrive at Southern Border, Scale Fence
articles.description: Video footage released by various Mexican news agencies say the first group of migrants with a caravan of 7,000 to 10,000 Central Americans have arrived at the United States-Mexico border.
articles.content: In live video footage by Televisa Tijuana Oficial and FRONTERA, Central American migrants reportedly with the caravan can be seen scaling a border fence that separates Tijuana, Mexico, and San Diego, California. The footage can be viewed here: #migranteshondu… [+1496 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Morris
articles.title: Ocasio-Cortez Joins Crowd of Youth Protesters at Nancy Pelosi’s Office
articles.description: Rep.-elect Alexandria Ocasio Cortez joined more than 200 youth activists in storming the office of House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi Tuesday morning in order to get her to act on climate change.
articles.content: Capitol police stated 51 protesters had been arrested after unlawfully demonstrating outside Pelosi’s office in the Cannon House Office Building. Police began making arrests when the protestors refused to leave the area after a few hours of demonstration. "We… [+1629 chars]

articles.author: Edwin Mora
articles.title: Ex-Prisoner: China Forces Uighurs to Praise Xi Jinping or Forego Food in Political Camps
articles.description: An ethnic Kazakh held prisoner in one of China's Uighur concentration camps confirmed to National Public Radio (NPR) Tuesday that the Communist Party forces those detained there to praise Chinese leader Xi Jinping before eating.
articles.content: Kayrat Samarkand, who grew up in the mountains of China’s rural Xinjiang province just miles away from the border with Kazakhstan, told NPR that authorities at the camps, also known as mind-transformation centers, force prisoners to sing songs praising Chines… [+3210 chars]

articles.title: Hans von Spakovsky: Democrats ‘Want Non-Citizens Voting’ Because ‘They Know It Will Help Them Win’
articles.description: Hans von Spakovsky said Democrats "want non-citizens voting" because "they know it will help them win elections."
articles.content: Von Spakovsky explained the “voter suppression” narrative pushed by Democrats and leftists, saying, “ That is a deliberate policy that’s been created by the left. The term ‘voter suppression,’ which you constantly hear now, that is a myth.” LISTEN : “That is … [+4113 chars]

articles.author: Breitbart News
articles.title: Official: Woolsey Fire Destruction ‘Significantly Higher’ Than 435 Structures
articles.description: (AP) — Authorities say destruction from Southern California’s huge wildfire will be significantly higher than the 435 structures already counted as destroyed.
articles.content: Los Angeles County Fire Chief Daryl Osby said at a press conference Tuesday that authorities are assessing damage from the 150-square-mile Woolsey Fire. Personnel are checking many canyon areas by foot, which will take several days. Authorities say risk from … [+3174 chars]
